contentList:
Dhampir Marked by a bloody inheritance, dark bargain, or harrowing encounter, dhampirs are creatures who have been forever changed by vampiric blood.
Dhampir Marked by a bloody inheritance, dark bargain, or harrowing encounter, dhampirs are creatures who have been forever changed by vampiric blood.
Relentless Thirst JNA_ThirstStatus Your thirst demands to be satisfied. You have disadvantage on all saving throws until you feed.
Deathless Nature JNA_Dhampir_Nature You no longer need to breathe, and you are resistant to poison.
Dhampir's Thirst JNA_ThirstPassive Every dhampir knows a thirst slaked only by the living. After each long rest, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JNA_ThirstStatus">Vicious Thirst</LSTag> until you feed on someone with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Vampire_JNA">Vampiric Bite</LSTag>
Deathless Vigor JNA_Dhampir_Vigor Your physical prowess is empowered by your vampiric blood. Your jump distance is increased, and you suffer less fall damage.
Vampiric Bite Sink your fangs into your enemy and satisfy your dark hunger. Vicious Claws A mark of your bloody inheritance, your claws are sharp enough to rend flesh and bone alike.
